page.title: 11TRANSPORT-WOODHALL SPA
page.content: Woodhall Spa is not very well served by public transport.If you do not have a car or a motor cycle it is very difficult to travel any distance because buses are not very frequent and there is no rail service today although the village used to be well served by trains.In the days when the spa had many visitors there was ample public transport. Houses in Woodhall Spa are very expensive.The average price in the village is almost twice the average price for Lincolnshire.Because of these factors most of the people who buy the houses are fairly well off and own cars,which means that buses and trains are becoming less necessary and declining further.
